name: DigiSpark ATtiny85
tagline: The tiny, Arduino enabled, usb dev board!
details: The **Digispark** is an Attiny85 based microcontroller development board similar to the Arduino line, only cheaper, smaller, and a bit less powerful. With a whole host of shields to extend its functionality and the ability to use the familiar Arduino IDE the Digispark is a great way to jump into electronics, or perfect for when an Arduino is too big or too much.
